name: Earl Grey (camsauce505)
description:
Play as the British noble, Earl Grey, in this platformer as he fights his way into the Gearmonger's stronghold to reclaim his stolen gears.

Made for the SUIndies 2019 GullJam

Controls -

A/S or Left Arrow/Right Arrow to move side to side

Space or Up Arrow to jump

R or Control to respawn

Esc to go back to the main menu
